title: 日本琉球大學 Inter-island Sustainability Educational Program International Symposium 2024
department: 國際事務處國際學生組

author.department: 國際事務處國際學生組
author.name: 呂姿穎

content:
分類： 活動公告, 演講暨研討會
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 呂姿穎 - issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 日本琉球大學 Inter-island Sustainability Educational Program International Symposium 2024
日期： Tue, 29 Oct 2024 10:37:21 +0800
附檔： University of the Ryukyus Inter-island Sustainability Educational Program International Symposium 2024_Poster.pdf (715 KB)   Inter-island Sustainability Educational Program International Symposium 2024.pdf (268 KB)   
English version in below
◎活動名稱: Inter-island Sustainability Educational Program International Symposium 2024

◎時間: 2024年11月4日、5日

◎地點: (實體)琉球大学研究者交流施設・50周年紀念館 多目的AB室
(線上): Zoom會議連結

◎費用: 免費

◎報名截止: 2024.10.31 17時(日本時間) 

1. 填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：
Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*在學證明

2.自行到姊妹校提供之連結報名:
第一天 (11/4): https://forms.office.com/r/gpSHFUFizX
第二天 (11/5): https://forms.office.com/r/EndBL5AK63

1. 其他資訊請詳細閱讀簡章後再報名，先報先得。
2. 請注意活動時間及時差問題。
3. 國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

◎Event Name : Inter-island Sustainability Educational Program International Symposium 2024

◎Period : November 4–5, 2024.

◎Location：
(in-person) University of the Ryukyus The Researcher Exchange Facility 50th Anniversary Memorial Hall Multi-purpose room AB
(Zoom) Zoom Webinars

◎Fee：FREE

◎Registration Deadline：2024.10.31 17:00 (Japan time)

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.
Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

•	Student Status Certificate

2. Complete application at : Registration Forms
*Day 1 (November 4): https://forms.office.com/r/gpSHFUFizX
*Day 2 (November 5): https://forms.office.com/r/EndBL5AK63

Please note:
1. Please make sure to read the program brochure before applying. The event operates on a first-come, first-served basis.
2. Please remember to account for the event schedule and time zone differences.
3. The OIA only announces or assists our school's students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school's regulations to apply for leave of absence.
